query:
{
  ecsTaskDefinitions(where: {readOnlyRootFS: false}) {
    identifier
    accountID
    cloudAccountID
    cloudAccountName
    cloudProvider
    idFromProvider
    internalAssetType
    internalName
    internalRegion
    assetCategory
    contentHash
  }
}
name: ECS containers should be limited to read-only access to root filesystems
